page.title: 04 A TYPICAL DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: I got up at 7.30am in the morning.I dressed, washed, and made breakfast. After my tea and toast, I combed my hair and took my little sister to school with me. On the way I met a friend and we all walked together. When the bell went at 8.50am we followed Mr.Pilling our teacher. He called the register and then we lined up for assembly. After assembly we had hymn practice until break at 10.30am. English was next and lasted until lunch at 12.00am. We carried on with our English after lunch until break at 2.30pm. Mr.Pilling read us a story and then we changed for P.E. we played "tig-ball" and then it was home time at 3.45pm, but before we left Mr.Pilling gave us all a letter about the{Alton Towers}trip. I rushed home and then went to the{mosque.
